department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Maintain accordant budgeting data on model monthly
description: The procurement is for maintaining the accual budgeting data model
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal - Accrual Budgeting Data Model
#### Sollication Number: 20231388
#### Reference Number: PW-23-01025299
#### Tender Closing Date: February 24, 2023, 13:00:00 Eastern Time (ET)

### Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites interested parties to submit a proposal for the maintenance, enhancement, and running of the Accrual Budgeting Data Model on a monthly basis. The model must support the training of PWGSC key employees and leverage the accrual budgeting data model.

### Tender Description
This request seeks a contractor to maintain, develop, and provide support for the Accrual Budgeting Data Model. The scope of work includes:

* Maintenance and enhancement of the accrual budgeting data model on a monthly basis
* Support and training for PWGSC key employees to leverage the accrual budgeting data model
* The accrual budgeting data model must support capital and non-capital investment data for all PWGSC branches and include three revolving funds.

### Requirements
To be considered for this tender, the contractor must meet the following requirements:

* Employee and Workplace Equity Promise
* Ethics and Integrity
* Claims for Privacy Breach
* Absence Management
* and Certified Supplier Checklist

### Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
* Technical Proposal
* Past Performance (based on a submitted contract history)
* Price

### Additional Information
For more information, please reach out to:
* Contact Person: Eric Beaudry
* Email: [eric.beaudry@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.beaudry@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 03 number without work hours, (Procurement supported)
